title: About Me
description: Technology leader, innovator, and AI solutions architect.

body.raw:
Hey, I'm Martin Ouimet, an innovative technology leader with 25+ years of experience transforming businesses through AI and cloud solutions. As the founder and CEO of Infinisoft World, I've built a 25-person company delivering enterprise-grade software across finance, healthcare, retail, and transportation sectors.

I'm passionate about exploring the intersection of AI and software engineering, particularly through experimental methodologies like the [AI-SDLC framework](https://github.com/mouimet-infinisoft/AISDLC) that enables human-AI team collaboration in software development.

## What drives my work?

- **Innovation in AI-Human Collaboration**: Developing frameworks that maintain engineering rigor while leveraging AI capabilities
- **Voice-Driven Development**: Pioneering mobile-only development approaches using voice conversation
- **Enterprise Solutions**: Building scalable, production-grade software that transforms business operations
- **Knowledge Sharing**: Contributing to the community through open-source frameworks and case studies

## What you'll find here

Technical deep-dives, case studies, and insights on:
- AI-assisted software development methodologies
- Voice-driven development techniques
- Enterprise architecture and cloud solutions
- Technology leadership and team building
- Experimental frameworks and their real-world applications

I believe in sharing the journey of innovation, including both successes and ongoing experiments that push the boundaries of how we build software.

## Get in Touch

- **Email**: [mart@infinisoft.world](mailto:mart@infinisoft.world)
- **LinkedIn**: [Connect with me](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mouimet-infinisoft/)
- **GitHub**: [Follow my work](https://github.com/mouimet-infinisoft)
- **Resume**: [Download CV](/martin-ouimet-resume.pdf)
